name: Escape To Earth
description:
Within a gameshow, players are sent to a Space Station orbiting Earth, locked inside a small room outside the station. Use your personal teleporter to place you somewhere on the station.

Find the four keycards 
*Red
*Blue
*Green
*Pink
Required safely get through the doors to find the FOUR (4) items to protect yourself, and safely make it back down to Earth safely.
*O2 Mask
*Space Suit
*Nav System
*Energy Cell

Only ONE player survives, the other dies on the station when the life support runs out.
